title: Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) On Turkey/Syria Crisis: Senator Rand Paul’s Mindset Is Exactly The Problem
text:
Targeting Turkey's economy, President Donald Trump announced sanctions earlier this week aimed at restraining the Turks' assault against Kurdish fighters and civilians in Syria -- an assault Turkey began after Trump announced he was moving U.S. troops out of the way. The United States also called on Turkey to stop the invasion and declare a cease-fire, and Trump is sending Vice President Mike Pence and national security adviser Robert O'Brien to Ankara as soon as possible in an attempt to begin negotiations.

Fox News Radio's Guy Benson gets reaction from Congressman Adam Kinzinger (R-IL).

Watch Below:
